about_the_game: Helbreath USA is a classic 2D fantasy MMORPG that immerses players in a world of epic battles, diverse characters, and strategic gameplay. Choose your path as a Warrior or Mage, and customize your character with powerful equipment and abilities. Engage in intense open-world PvP battles as two rival factions clash for dominance. Explore a dynamic world filled with unique monsters, challenging quests, and opportunities for progression through hunting, PvP, and cooperative missions. Whether you’re conquering massive sieges or mastering your skills in one-on-one duels, Helbreath USA offers a timeless experience for both seasoned adventurers and new players.

content_descriptors.notes: In Helbreath, mature content includes fantasy violence depicted through combat with monsters, faction battles, and PvP. There are no depictions of sexual acts, sexual assault, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm. The game focuses on strategic warfare and character progression in a fantasy setting.

detailed_description: Helbreath USA is a classic 2D fantasy MMORPG that immerses players in a world of epic battles, diverse characters, and strategic gameplay. Choose your path as a Warrior or Mage, and customize your character with powerful equipment and abilities. Engage in intense open-world PvP battles as two rival factions clash for dominance. Explore a dynamic world filled with unique monsters, challenging quests, and opportunities for progression through hunting, PvP, and cooperative missions. Whether you’re conquering massive sieges or mastering your skills in one-on-one duels, Helbreath USA offers a timeless experience for both seasoned adventurers and new players.
name: Helbreath USA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Helbreath USA brings relentless action and strategic warfare as Elvine and Aresden battle for supremacy. Engage in massive PvP, conquer towns, hunt rare monsters, and customize your hero with powerful spells and gear. Forge alliances, claim treasures, and leave your mark on the battlefield.
